question: When was shipment 4000 delivered?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {tracking_number: '4000'}) RETURN s.delivery_date AS delivery_date

question: Which shipments did SwiftExpress deliver early?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(c:Courier {name: 'SwiftExpress'}) WHERE s.delivery_date < s.expected_delivery_date RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Show all shipments going to San Diego
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DELIVERED_TO]->(l:Location {name: 'San Diego'}) RETURN s.tracking_number, s.status

question: What shipments does Carol Lee have?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:BELONGS_TO]->(c:Customer {name: 'Carol Lee'}) RETURN s.tracking_number, s.status

question: List shipments dispatched between May 25-31, 2024
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.dispatch_date >= '2024-05-25' AND s.dispatch_date <= '2024-05-31' RETURN s.tracking_number, s.dispatch_location

question: Is shipment 4002 still in transit?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {tracking_number: '4002'}) RETURN s.status = 'In Transit' AS in_transit

question: Who's handling shipment 4014?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {tracking_number: '4014'})-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(c:Courier) RETURN c.name

question: Where is shipment 4003 coming from and going to?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {tracking_number: '4003'})-[:DISPATCHED_FROM]->(d:Location), (s)-[:DELIVERED_TO]->(del:Location) RETURN d.name AS origin, del.name AS destination

question: Was shipment 4019 delivered on time?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {tracking_number: '4019'}) RETURN s.delivery_date <= s.expected_delivery_date AS on_time

question: What's the contact info for Bob Johnson's shipment 4009?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {tracking_number: '4009'})-[:BELONGS_TO]->(c:Customer {name: 'Bob Johnson'}) RETURN c.email, c.phone

question: Show all undelivered Phoenix-bound shipments
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DELIVERED_TO]->(l:Location {name: 'Phoenix'}) WHERE s.status <> 'Delivered' RETURN s.tracking_number

question: List delayed ParcelPro shipments
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(c:Courier {name: 'ParcelPro'}) WHERE s.delivery_date > s.expected_delivery_date RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Which San Francisco shipments haven't been dispatched?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DISPATCHED_FROM]->(l:Location {name: 'San Francisco'}) WHERE s.status = 'Pending Dispatch' RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Show all Denver to Philadelphia shipments
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DISPATCHED_FROM]->(d:Location {name: 'Denver'}), (s)-[:DELIVERED_TO]->(del:Location {name: 'Philadelphia'}) RETURN s.tracking_number

question: When will Mona Patel's 4019 shipment arrive?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {tracking_number: '4019'})-[:BELONGS_TO]->(c:Customer {name: 'Mona Patel'}) RETURN s.expected_delivery_date

question: Find shipments without dispatch dates
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.dispatch_date IS NULL RETURN s.tracking_number

question: List FastShip deliveries to Miami
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(c:Courier {name: 'FastShip'}), (s)-[:DELIVERED_TO]->(l:Location {name: 'Miami'}) RETURN s.tracking_number, s.delivery_date

question: How many QuickMove shipments are pending?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(c:Courier {name: 'QuickMove'}) WHERE s.status = 'Pending Dispatch' RETURN count(s) AS pending_count

question: What's the oldest undelivered shipment?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.status <> 'Delivered' RETURN s.tracking_number ORDER BY s.dispatch_date ASC LIMIT 1

question: Show all routes from Minneapolis
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DISPATCHED_FROM]->(d:Location {name: 'Minneapolis'}) RETURN DISTINCT d.name AS origin, s.delivery_location AS destination

question: Which customers have shipments from San Francisco?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DISPATCHED_FROM]->(:Location {name: 'San Francisco'}) RETURN DISTINCT s.customer

question: List shipments expected to arrive after June 1, 2024
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.expected_delivery_date > '2024-06-01' RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Show all SwiftExpress shipments to Atlanta
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(:Courier {name: 'SwiftExpress'}), (s)-[:DELIVERED_TO]->(:Location {name: 'Atlanta'}) RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Find shipments delivered before their expected date
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.delivery_date < s.expected_delivery_date RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Which courier handled shipment 4013?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {tracking_number: '4013'})-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(c:Courier) RETURN c.name

question: List all locations that shipments are going to from New York
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DISPATCHED_FROM]->(:Location {name: 'New York'}) RETURN DISTINCT s.delivery_location

question: Show customers with pending shipments
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment {status: 'Pending Dispatch'}) RETURN DISTINCT s.customer

question: Find shipments dispatched from Chicago but not yet delivered
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DISPATCHED_FROM]->(:Location {name: 'Chicago'}) WHERE s.status <> 'Delivered' RETURN s.tracking_number

question: List ParcelPro shipments with delivery dates in May 2024
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(:Courier {name: 'ParcelPro'}) WHERE s.delivery_date STARTS WITH '2024-05' RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Which shipments have missing delivery dates?
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.delivery_date IS NULL RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Show customers with both delivered and pending shipments
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WITH s.customer AS customer, COLLECT(DISTINCT s.status) AS statuses WHERE size(statuses) > 1 RETURN customer

question: List shipments that took more than 5 days to deliver
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE duration.between(date(s.dispatch_date), date(s.delivery_date)).days > 5 RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Find shipments going from Miami to Boston
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:DISPATCHED_FROM]->(:Location {name: 'Miami'}), (s)-[:DELIVERED_TO]->(:Location {name: 'Boston'}) RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Show average delivery time for FastShip
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(:Courier {name: 'FastShip'}) WHERE s.delivery_date IS NOT NULL RETURN avg(duration.between(date(s.dispatch_date), date(s.delivery_date)).days) AS avg_days

question: List shipments with duplicate tracking numbers
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WITH s.tracking_number AS tn, COUNT(*) AS count WHERE count > 1 RETURN tn

question: Find shipments delivered on weekends
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.delivery_date IS NOT NULL AND apoc.date.format(apoc.date.parse(s.delivery_date, 'ms', 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'ms', 'EEEE') IN ['Saturday', 'Sunday'] RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Show customers with shipments handled by multiple couriers
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WITH s.customer AS customer, COUNT(DISTINCT s.courier) AS couriers WHERE couriers > 1 RETURN customer

question: List shipments that changed delivery location
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.delivery_location <> s.expected_delivery_location RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Find shipments with conflicting status and dates
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) WHERE s.status = 'Delivered' AND s.delivery_date IS NULL RETURN s.tracking_number

question: Show most common shipment routes
cypher: MATCH (s:Shipment) RETURN s.dispatch_location + ' â†’ ' + s.delivery_location AS route, COUNT(*) AS frequency ORDER BY frequency DESC LIMIT 5
